name: time
description: Timestamp of the data point, extracted from the 'date' metadata.

name: year
description: The year of the data.

name: dekad
description: The 10-day period of the year (1-36).

name: geometry
description: The bounding box of the GeoTIFF.

name: asset_url
description: The location of the source GeoTIFF file.

name: creator
description: The creator of the file, from the metadata.

name: product_version
description: The product version, extracted from the description.

name: sensor_type
description: The sensor type, from the metadata.

name: units
description: The units of the data, from the metadata.

name: consolidation_period
description: The consolidation period, from the metadata.

name: days
description: The number of days the data represents.

name: file_creation
description: The creation timestamp of the file.

name: flags
description: The flags associated with the data.

name: lowest_actual_value
description: The lowest actual value in the data.

name: highest_actual_value
description: The highest actual value in the data.

name: lowest_possible_value
description: The lowest possible value in the data.

name: highest_possible_value
description: The highest possible value in the data.

name: lineage
description: The lineage of the data.

name: program_version
description: The program version used to generate the data.

name: width
description: The width of the image in pixels.

name: height
description: The height of the image in pixels.

name: pixel_size_x
description: The size of a pixel in the x-dimension.

name: pixel_size_y
description: The size of a pixel in the y-dimension.

name: crs
description: The coordinate reference system.
